text: ### Human: What are the office hours of Professor jyothi?### Assistant: Office hours for Professor Jyothi: Professor Jyothi's office hours are from 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM.

### Human: How do I apply for financial aid?### Assistant: Financial aid application process: To apply for financial aid, you need to fill out the VTU form online and submit any required documentation to the financial aid office.

### Human: What is the deadline for dropping a course?### Assistant: Course drop deadline: The deadline for dropping a course without a 'F' grade is March 15th. After that, you can still drop with a 'W' grade until April 30th.

### Human: How can I join a student club?### Assistant: Joining a student club: To join a student club, attend their meetings or events and reach out to the club president or advisor for more information.

### Human: What resources are available for tutoring?### Assistant: Tutoring resources: Tutoring services are available at the Student Learning Center. You can schedule appointments online or drop in during tutoring hours.

### Human: What is the process for requesting a transcript?### Assistant: Transcript request process: To request a transcript, fill out the transcript request form available on the registrar's website and submit it along with the required fee.

### Human: What are the requirements for graduation?### Assistant: Graduation requirements: To graduate, you need to complete all required courses, fulfill any major/minor requirements, and maintain a minimum GPA of 8.0.
### Human: What is the location of the Administrator center?### Assistant: Location of the Administrator center: The Administrator center is located in the Administrative block.
### Human: What is the location of the Kriyakalpa center?### Assistant: Location of the Kriyakalpa center: The Kriyakalpa center is located in front of Civil Block.
### Human: What is the location of the Mini mingos?### Assistant: Location of the Mini mingos: The Mini mingos is located in near RVCE Outer RD.

### Human: How do I apply for on-campus hostel?### Assistant: On-campus hostel application process: To apply for on-campus housing, log in to the hostel portal and complete the online application form.

### Human: What are the requirements for a student visa?### Assistant: Student visa requirements: Student visa requirements vary by country. Please contact the international student office for detailed information.
### Human: What are the campus dining options?### Assistant: Campus dining options: Campus dining options include the mini Mingos, food court, and various food trucks stationed around campus.

### Human: How do I access the online library resources?### Assistant: Accessing online library resources: You can access online library resources using your student ID and password through the library's website 'https://rvce.edu.in/lib-journals'.

### Human: What is the procedure for appealing a PVP?### Assistant: PVP appeal procedure: To appeal a grade, fill out the PVP appeal form and submit it to the academic affairs office within 30 days of receiving the grade.

### Human: How can I declare a major?### Assistant: Declaring a major process: To declare a major, schedule an appointment with your academic advisor to discuss your options and complete the necessary paperwork.
### Human: What is the deadline for applying for graduation?### Assistant: Graduation application deadline: The deadline for applying for graduation for the upcoming semester is October 1st.

### Human: What clubs and organizations are available on campus?### Assistant: Campus clubs and organizations: There are various clubs and organizations on campus, including academic, cultural, and recreational groups. You can explore the list on the student life website 'https://rvce.edu.in/clubs'.

### Human: How can I access disability services?### Assistant: Accessing disability services: To access disability services, contact the office of disability services to schedule an appointment and discuss your accommodations.

### Human: What is the process for requesting a leave of absence?### Assistant: Leave of absence request process: To request a leave of absence, fill out the leave of absence form and submit it to the HOD's office along with any required documentation and same to the Counsellors.

### Human: What are the requirements for transferring to another university?### Assistant: Transfer requirements: Transfer requirements vary depending on the university and program. It's recommended to consult with an academic advisor for personalized guidance.

### Human: How do I get a student ID card?### Assistant: Student ID card process: To get a student ID card, visit the respective branch office with a government-issued photo ID to have your picture taken and receive your card.

### Human: What is the procedure for withdrawing from a course?### Assistant: Course withdrawal procedure: To withdraw from a course, fill out the course withdrawal form and submit it to the Counsellors's office and same to the HOD's office before the deadline.

### Human: What campus resources are available for mental health support?### Assistant: Mental health support resources: Campus resources for mental health support include counseling services, support groups, and Hospital. You can schedule an appointment through the counseling center.

### Human: How can I access academic advising services?### Assistant: Accessing academic advising services: To access academic advising services, schedule an appointment with your assigned academic advisor through the student portal or by contacting the advising office.

### Human: What are the requirements for international students to work on campus?### Assistant: On-campus work requirements for international students: International students must obtain authorization from the international student office and comply with visa regulations to work on campus.

### Human: What is the procedure for requesting a transcript for graduate school applications?### Assistant: Transcript request for graduate school applications: To request a transcript for graduate school applications, submit the transcript request form to the registrar's office and indicate the mailing address for the recipient.

### Human: How can I apply for an internship?### Assistant: Internship application process: To apply for an internship, search for opportunities on the AICTCE website or attend department based Internships to network with potential employers.

### Human: What is the procedure for filing a complaint against a faculty member?### Assistant: Faculty complaint procedure: To file a complaint against a faculty member, follow the grievance procedure outlined in the student handbook and submit a formal complaint to the dean's office.
### Human: What is the date of the next exam?### Assistant: Date of next exam: The next exam is scheduled for April 22th, 2024.

### Human: How do I enroll in a course?### Assistant: Enrollment process: To enroll in a course, you need to fill out the enrollment form available at the 'rvce.edu.in/portal/basket_course' it along with any required documents.
### Human: What are the library hours?### Assistant: Library hours: The library is open from Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 9:00 PM, and on weekends closed.
### Human: How to lend book from library?### Assistant: Library lending: The library will provide lending system with provided ID-Card for 15 days.

### Human: How can I reset my password for the student portal?### Assistant: Password reset: You can reset your password by visiting the IT help desk in your respective Department with your student ID card for verification and email 'prapullasb@rvce.edu.in'.
### Human: What is the grading policy for this course?### Assistant: Grading policy: The grading policy for this course includes assignments and labs(30%), midterm exam (20%), and final exam (50%).
### Human: When is the next seminar on campus?### Assistant: Next campus seminar date: The next campus seminar is scheduled for April 5th, 2024, at 3:00 PM in the auditorium.
### Human: How can I sign up for the fitness gym membership?### Assistant: Fitness center membership signup process: Only available for hostel residers.
### Human: What are the office hours for the academic office?### Assistant: Academic advising office hours: The academic advising office is open Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
### Human: where is parking areat?### Assistant: Parking area: parking area available near Computer Science Ground(cricket) and motorbikes near the etrance.
### Human: What are the requirements for joining the NCC Club?### Assistant: NCC Club requirements: To join the NCC club, you must submit an application along with a letter of recommendation.

### Human: Where can I find information about study abroad programs?### Assistant: Study abroad program information: Information about study abroad programs can be found on the international programs office website or by attending one of their informational sessions.

### Human: How do I access the university's Wi-Fi network?### Assistant: University Wi-Fi access: To access the university's Wi-Fi network, log in with your student credentials, and select the network named 'RVCE-WiFi'.

### Human: What is the procedure for applying for a research grant?### Assistant: Research grant application procedure: To apply for a research grant, submit a proposal outlining your research project to the research office along with any required forms and documentation.

### Human: How do I book a meeting room in the library?### Assistant: Library meeting room booking: To book a meeting room in the library, visit the library's website or inquire at the circulation desk for availability and reservation instructions.

### Human: What resources are available for career counseling?### Assistant: Career counseling resources: Career counseling services are available at the career center. You can schedule an appointment with a career counselor to discuss your career goals and options.

### Human: Where can I find information about campus events?### Assistant: Campus events information: Information about campus events can be found on the College's event calendar, which is available on the student portal or the university's website 'https://rvce.edu.in/it-events-and-seminars'.

### Human: How do I request an official transcript?### Assistant: Official transcript request process: To request an official transcript, log in to the registrar's website and submit the transcript request form. You may need to pay a fee for processing.

### Human: What is the procedure for applying for a student loan?### Assistant: Student loan application procedure: To apply for a student loan, fill out the loan application form available on the financial aid office website and submit it along with any required documentation.

### Human: How do I access the university's online learning platform?### Assistant: Online learning platform access: You can access the university's online learning platform by logging in with your student credentials on the platform's website or through the student portal.

### Human: What are the steps for registering for classes?### Assistant: Class registration steps: To register for classes, log in to the student portal during your designated registration period, pick and select available courses, add them to your schedule, and complete the registration process.
